content: day 16 / 24 home sweet home abbreviations chain - chain decrease - decrease difficulty slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet time 1 h material yarnart jeans hook 2 mm written pattern row 1 chain 14 row 2 skip one chain single_crochet 13 chain turn total 13 row 3 - 11 single_crochet 13 chain turn total 13 row 12 decrease single_crochet 11 chain turn total 12 row 13 decrease single_crochet 10 chain turn total 11 row 14 decrease single_crochet 9 chain turn total 10 continue with decreasing until you reach total 1 weave the ends in attach the white yarn at any point slip_stitch around the gingerbread house 1 slip_stitch in each row of single_crochet and one slip_stitch in each single_crochet take the needle and the same white yarn and sew the details i recommend to sew the line in the top of row 11 windows and door hanger make the hanger from the ribbon or the yarn of your choice and attach it at the top of the gingerbread home congratulations you finished the 16th ornament be sure to add the result in the dedicated thread in the event 8 to go
